Text.Page: The flight to Northern Arun is anything but smooth.

I'm combining flavors you never dreamed of. Garlic strawberry! Horseradish caramel! I'm going to take you to Flavortown!

Which means I don't have time to deliver special orders. If Paesyn wants to eat, Paesyn can eat with the other troops."I'll take it to him."

Really? That seems kind.

Weird.

All right. Take this totally gourmet lunchbox to him.
<PCNAME>! We're on our way to Northern Arun! Isn't this exciting?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"A tad stimulating."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I smell food. You brought my lunch? How wonderful! You must really like me!

Yummy!

Now...who should I get to like me next?

I know! Zolyn! Do you think I should talk to her now?

I couldn't do it. Her look flattened my ears!

Would you do me a favor? I wrote her a poem to cheer her up, but I can't give it to her! Can you?

"There was an old person of Ischia, whose conduct grew friskier and friskier?" What does that even mean? I'm from Popolion.

There's no time for this nonsense. We're on a mission.

Don't encourage Sir Fursalot. Make yourself useful and get a status report from Haruho, downstairs.

Things look good here, .

Pico's also on watch. Check with him.

What could be wrong? We're in the sky!

Sky is clear, speed is stable. Nothing could go wrong."Careful. You'll jinx it."

Who were they?

They must be up on deck. You have to stop them.

Find Lekul!
<PCNAME>, we have a fight on our hands!
